title: key fragment
body:
ok so before like 2 or more weeks i asked why wasnt i geting key fragment and someone told me that im going to get 12 key fragment every month but iv played like 20 or more games and iv been geting honored in august but i steel havent recived even 1 key fragment      

sorry for bad english

replies.body: I'm not sure if you're referring to a different account or not, but it does look like this account has been getting a good amount of key fragments so far this month!  Since the first of this month you've gotten 2 Honor Capsules, the first of which had 5 fragments and the second had 3. Let me know if you weren't the one who crafted those fragments into keys though!
ooh my bad i'm sorry i was thinking i woud get capsuls and key fragments i didnt think the fragments inside the capsuslse are the ones i was supposed to get i'm really sorry
Yea, man.. this is so frustrating. Key fragments are just not dropping. Honor 3, and nothing. Can someone look into this?
